addLiquidityAndCreatePayroll(address,add.details: Add liquidity position and create payroll in a single transaction

addLiquidityPosition(address,address,uin.details: Add a new liquidity position for a company

cancelPayroll(uint256,address).details: Cancel a payroll and return the amount to available

params.payrollId: ID of the payroll to cancel

claimPayrollAmount(uint256,address).details: Claim payroll amount and rewards for a beneficiary

createPayrollMulti(uint256,address,uint2.details: Create a new payroll linked to a liquidity position with multiple beneficiaries

params.amounts: List of amounts to pay per beneficiary

returns.positionIndex: Index of the linked liquidity position

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlockPayrollForBeneficiary(uint256,addr.details: Unlock payroll for a beneficiary (can be called by anyone, but only after endTime)
